alert.note: Alert for Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:59AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL JONES AND NORTHEASTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 959 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, or 9 miles northwest of Anamosa, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Jones and northeastern Linn Counties, including the following locations... Marion Airport, Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, Matsell Bridge Natural Area and Linn County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
